frontmatter.title: Data Warehousing for Dummies PDF: How BIG do I build?
frontmatter.short: I want to talk about an important question, “Should you build one large database of information (a data warehouse) and then parcel off smaller portions to different organizations, or should you build a bunch of smaller scale databases (data marts) and then integrate them together later?
frontmatter.hero_alt: Data Warehousing for Dummies PDF: How BIG do I build?

mdx.excerpt: This is the third blog in my Data Warehousing for Dummies blog series. If you would like, I have a FREE Data Warehousing for Dummies PDF…
